title: Mortgage Rate Inquiry
description: A potential customer is inquiring about current interest rates for a 30-year fixed-rate mortgage.

tasks.description: Gather basic information from the customer, such as estimated credit score, loan amount, and property value.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects the necessary inputs to provide a rate quote.

tasks.description: Use the rate quoting tool to provide an indicative interest rate and APR.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the current indicative rate for a customer with the specified profile.

tasks.description: Explain the difference between interest rate and APR and outline the next steps to apply.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the financial terms and application process.
